save.description: Will negates, Fortitude negates, see text

system.shortDescription: This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.j7mhkhixnvd0amye]{Oneiric Horror} except each round the subject fails its Will save, it takes 1 point of Strength damage, and after the spell ends, the subject must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf1.pf1e-rules.NSqfXaj4MevUR2uJ.JournalEntryPage.AVaxTNildXRzYnQm]{fatigued} for a number of minutes equal to the number of rounds spent under the spell's effect.
